title: What They Say
subtitle: Rumors overheard in the Astral Bazaar
intro: What people say when they think she isn't listening.

rumors.text: She's hiding from her family. Some kind of falling out.
She poisoned someone back on Bral. That's why she ran. Ask around the docks if you don't believe me.
She once traced a bad barrel of flour across three ports. Took her two weeks.
She's a forger. Documents, signatures, manifests. That's why the ink never washes out.
She reads minds. How else would she know when you're lying?
Dock workers trust her. She's patched up more cargo haulers than any guild healer.
Someone with deep pockets wants her found. Alive, specifically. Make of that what you will.
She doesn't drink anything she didn't pour herself. Not even water.
She works for one of the big Costers, running quality audits undercover. That's how she knows so much about supply chains.
